control.name: Hints
control.helpHtml: This control is capable of attaching hints to multiple controls. Hints can be activated by click/tab or hover, and can have individual tips per control. It is also possible to stylise the hint that appears. An example would be to give it a thick border, a background and some opacity rules.

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Hints
property.helpHtml: Sets the information for each hint and assigns them to a control on the page. Each hint can be styled individually and can alter between click and hover actions.
